==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Norma:''' Hmm? What's wrong?
:{{DIcon}} What are you doing?
::'''Norma:''' Oh, I was just on my way to buy some food.
::'''Norma:''' Not groceries, though... I was going to get some restaurant takeout and bring it home with me. My husband has long since grown tired of my cooking...
::'''Norma:''' You're a traveler? How delightful...
::'''Norma:''' I've heard that over in Liyue they have such a wide variety of different dishes that they've had to split it into several different cuisines...
::'''Norma:''' I would love to visit if I ever had the chance.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye...
::'''Norma:''' Okay, bye-bye.
{{Dialogue end}}
